properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 29 at 3:41AM EST until January 30 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 20 knots with gusts up to 25 knots
and seas 4 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 6 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 6 PM EST THURSDAY
